component.name: The Unofficial Homestuck Collection
component.summary: Offline collection of Homestuck and its related works

description.p: The Unofficial Homestuck Collection is a heavily customised browser built from the ground up to support offline reading of Homestuck and its related works.
The Asset Pack V2 is required for the application to function. This is a separate download that can be found on the homepage.

release.description:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/GiovanH/unofficial-homestuck-collection/compare/v2.6.7...v2.7.0

Several bugfixes, including fixing a bug where the validator would give first-time users a false positive that the asset pack was invalid.

Features:

Some features for modding. Remember to use the minAppVersion property to note that your mod needs 2.7.0!

  • Modding: editPage lazy content edits, expose ipcRender
  • Structure PageText to allow overriding displayed content at runtime

Also some technical features:

  • Build: Don't bundle non-unified NSIS builds
  • Updater: Wait 12 hours between subsequent checks
  • Replace sharp dependency with gif-frames implementation

Bugfix:

  • Better imod validation fixes a bug where correct asset packs would not correctly validate on first run
  • Update FAQ
  • Adjust blogspot unlock
  • Update FAQ link
  • If using ruffle fallback on electron, disable flash player entirely.
  • Add link to validator, fix icon style issues in setup wizard

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GiovanH/unofficial-homestuck-collection/compare/v2.6.1...v2.6.7

Features:

  • Feature: censor female nudity
  • Feature: Asset Pack Validator

Plus two emergency fixes preventing people from installing and validating the collection since 2.6.5 (now deleted)

Also includes several bugfixes and stability improvements.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GiovanH/unofficial-homestuck-collection/compare/v2.5.2...v2.5.6

What's Changed

  • Bugfixes to resolve issues with youtube and similar external links
  • Improved skaianet systems page (thanks @kittenchilly)
  • Fixed a bug causing notifications to cause scrollbar jitter
  • mods: fix storing false by @bb010g in https://github.com/GiovanH/unofficial-homestuck-collection/pull/609
  • 2.5.2 -> 2.5.6 by @GiovanH in https://github.com/GiovanH/unofficial-homestuck-collection/pull/612

New Contributors

  • @bb010g made their first contribution in https://github.com/GiovanH/unofficial-homestuck-collection/pull/609

description.p: Bugfix to fix https://github.com/GiovanH/unofficial-homestuck-collection/issues/601. Promoted to full release 2024-08-24
This update brings the main release of The Unofficial Homestuck Collection up-to-date with the prerelease and web beta.
This is a minor update that should formally fix the Sharp bug for all users.

ul.li: Option to use native window decorations - by @GiovanH in #267
Genericise notification behavior for mods - by @GiovanH in #283
Dragging images now displays a preview of the image, instead of the placeholder captcha card - by @GiovanH in #316
Several new context menu options, including "Copy Image" - by @GiovanH in #317
Crash that occurred when upgrading from a previous version of the collection - by @GiovanH in #285
Some cases where new reader progress wouldn't update correctly - by @GiovanH in #282
A local IP address being displayed with the path of certain images - by @Bambosh in #326
Some HQ flashes with double & incorrectly linked scarecrowking images in the news section - by @GiovanH in #324

description.p: Known Issue: If you delete the old Asset Pack V1 before launching version 2.0 of the program for the first time, you'll get a javascript error. This can be avoided by deleting Asset Pack V1 after setting up version 2.0, or you can recover from the problem by deleting your %appdata%/unofficial-homestuck-collection folder.

ul.li: Added option to embed the jump bar in the header, just like a real address bar.
Added options to override how text is displayed on MSPA pages. There are controls for font family, weight, size, and line height.
Added option to let theme overrides be overridden by other themed pages.
Added option to switch between pixelated/auto image scaling on MSPA pages.
Added option to disable smooth scrolling.
Fixed the zoom shortcut not working with the +/- buttons on the numpad, and added more zoom increments.
Steam links now open in the client if you have it installed (thanks @leo60228).
Added context menu option to search highlighted text in Google.
Altered a credit that was deadnaming Gankra.
Fixed Ascend's track commentary being cut off.
A whole lot of UI fixes and polish.

description.p: This is the initial release of The Unofficial Homestuck Collection!

Requires V1 of the Asset Pack to function. You'll have to find it elsewhere, sorry! Once you've got it downloaded, you'll have to tell the application where to find it during the initial startup process. After that, you're set!
